GriddedInfoWindowHandler
object in module npn-viz-tool

Description

Injectable class that can be used to produce InfoWindows for a specific map given LatLng, Layer and Legend objects.

Methods

  • close()

    Closes any currently open InfoWindow.

  • open(latLng, layer, legnend)

    Open an InfoWindow containing gridded point data if all that's necessary is supplied. This function can be called lazily without checking references, it will do nothing if any of the required input is missing (all parameters).

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    latLnggoogle.maps.LatLng

    The LatLng where the InfoWindow should be opened.

    layernpn-viz-tool.gridded-services:WmsMapLayer

    The layer the gridded data should come from.

    legnendnpn-viz-tool.gridded-services:WmsMapLegend

    The legend associated with the layer that can be used for format gridded response data.
